channel.title: Remove
channel.description: Stupid guy flames me rofl! And one of my best GFX to -.-

item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I never said moparsc4p3 wasn’t a ripper…He obviously is. You said FB possibly was…

Anyway, I don’t want to get a moderation again, so I’ll shut up.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:12, topic:125272”]xxlegitxx, you need to stop posting as if you’re the dogs bollucks. It’s starting to piss me off.

I dunno how you got all that ‘FastBawlz is defensive + a ripper’ shit.[/quote]

Yes, I’m so sorry. The only thing that would get anyone’s attention is by accusing a Gfx Master of ripping. That one sentence is the only thing you bothered to post about.

Here are two other threads in which he claimed he made a sig:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

The Naruto sig linked to a photobucket account by the name of Chozoelite with 368 images.

The punching animation linked to a photobucket account by the name of Nightenkei with an unknown amount of images.

This spiderman sig is attached to an imageshack account. On planet renders, Milton P. has a variety of very good sigs, and I find it hard to believe moparsc4p3 waited until now to show us how good he is at making sigs. And if he really was Milton P., he could easily prove it by posting something over there or changing his profile in some characteristic fashion, and there need not be a discussion. Given the fact that he cannot or will not identify himself as moparsc4p3 on planet renders, we can only conclude that he ripped the sig, and that he is a fraud.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:10, topic:125272”]No its because you don’t even know that he ripped it yet… I wasn’t being defensive…

I have different names, so I have to explain and prove sometimes… Like having the name Cinema in SRF… Maybe he does too…
You cant just jump to conclusions because he made a OK sig and he has never made something good before… Even though with the other sigs it does kind of looked like he ripped it… Especially since he keeps using different Photobuckets, I guess you do have a point

BTW isn’t it “Why your getting your panties in a bunch”?..[/quote]

It’s actually quite obvious. Click here, and read some previous posts of his. He types nothing like moparsc4p3 does.

From what I see, he’s linking to 3 different accounts on Photobucket. Each of those users has hundreds of images. Is that simply being retarded?

Yes, sorry I forgot the ‘ch.’

Read full topic

item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:9, topic:125272”][quote author=moparsc4p3 link=topic=175480.msg1614534#msg1614534 date=1184917042]
Stupid guy flames me rofl! And one of my best GFX to -.-
[/quote]

No one flamed you. And it would be a simple matter to prove you are Milton P., by mentioning the fact that you are indeed Moparscape in a post by Milton, or some other method.

Ok I will and am I not talking like a adult? Just because I used “Nor” doesn’t mean I am talking like a adult.

No, the fact that Milton punctuates properly, capitalizes properly, and writes a coherent sentence.

How about you edit your post there saying your name is also Moparsc4p3 so both of you can shut up?

I don’t see why you are getting your panties in a bunch. As a graphics master, you shouldn’t encourage this stuff with anything less than a slap on the wrist. You should know how much effort goes into these sigs, and ripping should not be taken lightly. Unless of course, the reason you are so defensive is that you, too, rip sigs.[/quote]

No its because you don’t even know that he ripped it yet… I wasn’t being defensive…

I have different names, so I have to explain and prove sometimes… Like having the name Cinema in SRF… Maybe he does too…
You cant just jump to conclusions because he made a OK sig and he has never made something good before… Even though with the other sigs it does kind of looked like he ripped it… Especially since he keeps using different Photobuckets, I guess you do have a point

BTW isn’t it “Why your getting your panties in a bunch”?..

Read full topic

item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

moparsc4p3:

Stupid guy flames me rofl! And one of my best GFX to -.-

No one flamed you. And it would be a simple matter to prove you are Milton P., by mentioning the fact that you are indeed Moparscape in a post by Milton, or some other method.

moparsc4p3:

Ok I will and am I not talking like a adult? Just because I used “Nor” doesn’t mean I am talking like a adult.

No, the fact that Milton punctuates properly, capitalizes properly, and writes a coherent sentence.

FastBawlz:

How about you edit your post there saying your name is also Moparsc4p3 so both of you can shut up?

I don’t see why you are getting your panties in a bun. As a graphics master, you shouldn’t encourage this stuff with anything less than a slap on the wrist. You should know how much effort goes into these sigs, and ripping should not be taken lightly. Unless of course, the reason you are so defensive is that you, too, rip sigs.

item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

moparsc4p3:

yeah… guess what! I am milton from there! SO GFTO

That’s odd. Milton P actually types like an adult.

[quote=“Milton_P.”]Thanks, but I’m not as talented with the lasso tool, nor with the pen tool.
So I still need help, anyone here has a tut, or something?[/quote]

If you are Milton P, why don’t you make a post over there with my name in it?

moparsc4p3:

My real life name is milton t [ last name starts with t] and I used that name on planetrenders

Oh, and over there, you put down you were 15 year old. On MITB, you say you’re 11?
